body_html:
Also notice that Description has already a ToMap() that could be consumed to output all the key/values. I agree that is unexpected to see all dump of information and at the beginning looks like the library is not working.
Maybe add a verbosity env parameter to control when to output the device description ?
body_text:
Also notice that Description has already a ToMap() that could be consumed to output all the key/values.  I agree that is unexpected to see all dump of information and at the beginning looks like the library is not working.
Maybe add a verbosity env parameter to control when to output the device description ?
body:
Also notice that Description has already a `ToMap()` that could be consumed to output all the key/values.  I agree that is unexpected to see all dump of information and at the beginning looks like the library is not working. 
Maybe add a verbosity env parameter to control when to output the device description ?
